title: Fort Washington Flip Recipe
full_text:
Fort Washington Flip Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
applejack
3/4
ounce
Benedictine
1/2
ounce
maple syrup
1
fresh egg
Directions
Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker; add the egg, fill with ice and shake very vigorously for at least 10 seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass; garnish with a grating of fresh nutmeg.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker and strainer
